cycle_001.speaker: Clinician
cycle_001.text: That's fantastic, Sarah. Water polo is such a great sport for building strength and endurance. Have you had any health concerns since I saw you last year?

cycle_001.speaker: Patient
cycle_001.text: No, I feel great. Just got over a cold last month, but it wasn't bad.

cycle_001.speaker: Clinician
cycle_001.text: Good to hear. Let's get your measurements done. Can you step on the scale for me? Okay, you're 5'7" and 135 pounds. You're right on track-

cycle_002.speaker: Clinician
cycle_002.text: Perfect. Now let's check your blood pressure and heart rate.

cycle_002.speaker: Patient
cycle_002.text: The cuff feels tight, but it works well.

cycle_002.speaker: Clinician
cycle_002.text: It'll just take a moment. Blood pressure is 110/70, which is perfect. Heart rate is 62. That's excellent. All that swimming is really showing.

cycle_002.speaker: Patient
cycle_002.text: I have always been athletic but water polo has really gotten me in great shape.

cycle_002.speaker: Clinician
cycle_002.text: I'm checking your records and I see you're due for your Tdap booster and this year's flu shot. I am prescribing them.
